column4: sorry guys..... i still can't install java using my terminal...
any comment?
add the repo and use synaptic?
did you add find the repo?
you want the java JRE right?
sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
sources* with an s
add "deb http://ubuntu.tower-net.de/ubuntu/ hoary java" with out the quotes on the last line
make a new line at the bottom and paste it there
sure just make sure its on its own line
save it and go back to terminal
sudo apt-get update
run synaptic and search for java, JRE should be available
search button
see it?
try j2re
anything for java?
